summary: Testimonial Section Redesign - Bluesneaker Style with Full Uncropped Images

css.description: Updated testimonial styles to match bluesneaker.netlify.app with full images at top
key_changes: Changed card from 2-column layout to vertical flex column
Added .testimonial-image class: 30% width, max-width 200px, rounded corners (8px), contain not cover
Changed star color from #ffc107 (yellow) to #8B2942 (brand red)
Text size reduced from 15px to 14px, line-height from 1.7 to 1.5
All elements now full width with proper text alignment

javascript_renderTestimonials.description: Updated renderTestimonials() function to show full image at top
javascript_renderTestimonials.old_code:
function renderTestimonials(count) { return testimonials.slice(0, count).map(t => `
${t.name}
${platformSVGs[t.platform]} Verified Purchase
${'★'.repeat(t.rating)}${'☆'.repeat(5-t.rating)}

${t.text}

${t.date}
`).join(''); }
javascript_renderTestimonials.new_code:
function renderTestimonials(count) { return testimonials.slice(0, count).map(t => `
${t.name}
${platformSVGs[t.platform]} Verified Purchase
${'★'.repeat(t.rating)}${'☆'.repeat(5-t.rating)}

${t.text}

${t.date}
`).join(''); }
